summary: This is an internal email from a chief prosecutor acknowledging the indictment of GM (Ghislaine Maxwell) in the Epstein case. It praises the prosecution team's hard work, frames the case as uniquely important for delivering justice to victims, and notes GM is being located for arrest.

connections.description: Linked together in the case, with the prosecution targeting GM following JE's actions.

events.title: Indictment of GM
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was indicted, the result of a year's worth of work by the prosecution team.

events.title: GM Arrest Process
events.description: GM was in the process of being located for arrest following the indictment.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell (GM) was indicted on or around June 29, 2020, after a year of investigative work.
The prosecution viewed the Epstein/Maxwell case as uniquely important for delivering justice to victims who were wronged first by Epstein and then by the justice system.
The email author, a chief prosecutor, expresses immense pride in the team's work and considers this one of the most honorable cases of their tenure.
At the time of the email, authorities were actively working to locate and arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.
